transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan ji Piyush bhaiya?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Oh kya hua update hua hai kya phir?
Customer: Kya? Achcha ye Aadi sir bol rahe hai na?
Customer: Haan, Balastone se bol raha tha.
Executive: Haan update ho gaya aaj buylead bhi to dikhna chalu ho gayi thi aaj buylead bhi dikhi thi sir ko temple construction ki.
Executive: To mere khayal se bas wo is category ka to kaam ho hi gaya hai. Aap check bhi karoge waha dikhega aapko aap upar jab apna portal khologe to search mein aap category daal ke dekhoge aapko har category mein product dikh jayega.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Kal bhi kiya tha maine parso bhi thoda kiya tha kal to us din mein jyadatar wahi kiya hai maine aaj bhi kiya tha complete kar diya hai. Mere ko show nahi kar raha hai ye.
Executive: Kya nahi show kar raha?
Customer: Recently we could not find any related buylead for you.
Executive: Achcha buylead abhi available nahi hogi baki wo to maine sahi kar diya matlab abhi din mein ek temple construction ki dikhi hui thi Aadi sir ne mujhe Ahmedabad ki matlab wo category add ho gayi tabhi dikhna chalu ho gayi na waha pe abhi wo aaj hi hua hai ya pura complete aaj hua hai to wo ho sakta hai abhi kal se pura okay ho jayega wo kyuki kuch bhi hum add karte hai na to next day se hi live hota hai.
Executive: Dheere dheere abhi phir haan dikhna chalu ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Jyada dikhna chalu ho jayega sir wo aapka.
Customer: Ye thoda ye ye issue thoda hamara thoda solve kijiye na aap. Bahut jyada reh raha hai ye. First second ka rehta hai first second ka.
Executive: Sir ye issue matlab solve nahi ho sakta kyuki iska reason ye hai na aise aise log bhi baithe hue hai waha pe jo zero second ek second mein lead utha le rahe hai jo sir ne lead miss kari wahi lead do logo ne utha li.
Customer: Maine afternoon ke time pe ek lead mere ko dikhi. Main open hi tha aaj se. Main portal pe hi tha. Jaise maine refresh kiya aayi just click kiya aur just sold out.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ab uska kya solution hai main to khud open hi tha isme.
Executive: To kya hua phir jab dikhi aapko to?
Customer: Abhi maan ke chalo main buylead pe pura check kar raha hu thik hai. Hmm. Jaise hi aayi mere paas click kiya sold out.
Executive: Thoda thoda late ho gaya hoga aapka.
Customer: Are to mere system se login hai main ekdam dekh raha hu us lead pe.
Executive: Nahi main bata raha hu wo kya hoga na aap se pehle hi paanch logo ne click kar liya hoga Aadi sir. Are to sahi baat hai main jab main system pe hath mein hi hu mere hath mein hi hai mere on the screen pe hu to phir bhi wo click nahi ho raha hai to phir kya matlab hai uska?
Executive: Main bata raha hu jab tak paanch log us pe karenge nahi na tab tak wo rahega aur jaise hi paanch click karenge aap mujhe bataye kis jagah thi kaun si thi main dekh ke batata abhi un kitne kitne lead li hai main aapko dekh ke bata bhi dunga jaise Aadi sir ne mujhe batayi thi dopahar.
Customer: Impossible lag raha hai ye agar aise is type se raha to abhi main dekh ke bhi aise ho rahi hai mere sath mein to phir mujhe kaise lead accept hogi?
Executive: Nahi main bata to raha hu Aadi sir yahi yahi Hasan sir ke sath hua tha but jo lead unse miss hui thi wo bata rahe ki ek second mein chali gayi thi but wo lead bhi kuch supplier ne aapke Makrana mein unhone naam bhi bataya tha unko ek Nadeem Chauhan ji hai koi Smart Marble se ek the kya naam hai unka isse kya naam hai aapke Ashraf Joya se Aamir ji in logo ne dono ke account mein wo lead consume ho gayi thi to is tarike se ab jaise unhone li hai to ab unke paas bhi aise dikhi hogi lekin wo ye log kya hai itne active rehte hai na isliye aapko marble temple ki buylead ke liye bilkul hame agar do ghante aap chala rahe to do ghante screen se nazar hatani nahi padegi itna competition hai Makrana mein tabhi wo lead mil payegi iska koi solution nahi main kehne ko aapko keh bhi du Aadi sir but koi matlab nahi kyuki main chalo aaj bol dunga ki sir kal sahi ho jayega but wo sahi nahi hona kyuki wo lead publish hoti hai ek sath sab jagah jaise hi paanch click karenge wo chahe ek second mein kar le agar wo do ghante tak bhi nahi karenge do ghante tak padi rahegi but paanch log consume karenge wo gayab ho jayegi.
Customer: Sir ye to bahut mushkil lag raha hai mere ko.
Executive: Haan yahi ye sir mushkil hai isi liye to har koi isme nahi le pa raha kuch log hai jo active jyada hai wo 80 80 90 90 lead le ja rahe hai ek category mein aur hum log ke account pe wahi 10 12 15 bahut jyada kabhi hota hai to 20 lead uth paati hai pure mahine mein.
Customer: Aur ye bhi mobile ke ya desktop pe ya kuch fark padta hoga?
Executive: Haan desktop pe thoda sa kya hai desktop pe kya karte hai to log software laga lete hai refresher wala to usme kya hai unko hath nahi hai samne screen khol ke aapne andar rakh di buylead wali ab bas aap buylead aise screen pe dekhte rahiye to ek ek second mein bhi koi buylead aayegi to apne aap wo samne aapko dikhti rahegi ye hota hai.
Executive: Hota kya hai na ki jo buylead aapko waha pe dikh rahi hoti hai na ki ek second zero second pehle actual mein zero second mein nahi aayi hui hoti hai wo wo aa do char paanch second pehle chuki hoti hai but wo refresh hone mein hi ek do teen second lag jate hai to tab hum log ko dikhti hai aur jo log refresher lagaye rehte hai laptop pe na unka apne aap har teen char second mein jitna time set kar dete hai wo refresh hota rehta hai to unhe screen chuni bhi nahi hai aise samne laga ke rakh diya wo apne aap screen refresh hogi jaise hi koi buylead aayegi unke samne pehle dikh jati hai.
Executive: Hum log ko kya hai refresh karna padta hai maine wo sir ko bola hai ki sir agar koi laptop wagera hai apne paas to main aapke mein laga dunga software.
Customer: To sabse consult karna padega.
Executive: Ji maine unko bataya tha dopahar mein baat hui hai.
Customer: To sahi kar diya kya aapne? Ye to ye to sahi bata rahe hai na sahi hoga na ye.
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: Jo buylead ka jo categories ka tha wo to isse sahi hoga na?
Executive: Haan wo to kar diya maine wo to mere hi hath ka tha wo to maine kar diya aap check bhi kar lijiye aapko dikh jayega.
Customer: Nahi mere ko abhi nahi bata raha hai ek minute. Nahi lead nahi hai main wo category bata raha hu lead to kya ab aaj complete hua hai to lead ab kal se dikhna ho sakta hai chalu ho jayegi kyuki sara hat gaya tha na.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir bhaiya.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads.

- Buyleads are sold out immediately after appearing.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the competition for buyleads.

- Executive mentioned the category issue is resolved.

- Executive suggested using a desktop with refresher software.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will consult with someone about laptop software.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, competition, desktop, software, category
